Contractors will need the following documents to have their bids accepted.

```{r}
library(gt)
tibble::tibble(
  document = c(
    "SAM Unique Entity ID",
    "Shelby County Business License",
    "TN Contractor License",
    "EOC/LOSB Number",
    "Certificate of Insurance",
    "EPA RRP Lead Firm Certificate",
    "TDEC Lead Firm Certificate"
    )
  # estimated_time = "x days",
  # estimated_cost = "$XXX"
  ) |>
  gt() |>
  cols_label_with(
    fn = function(x) {
      stringr::str_replace_all(x, "_", " ") |>
      stringr::str_to_title()
    }
  ) |>
  tab_options(
    table.align = "left"
  ) |> 
  opt_row_striping()
```

::: {.callout-important}
## Notice to new contractors
An EPA RRP Certificate will take at least a month to acquire.
:::

### SAM Unique Entity ID {#SAMS}

Create an account for free at [sam.gov](https://sam.gov/). 

::: {.callout-warning appearance="simple"}
When registering for an account, make sure your entity is publicly searchable.
:::

### EOC/LOSB Number {#EOC}

A Shelby County Equal Opportunity Compliance (EOC) Number or a Locally Owned Small Business (LOSB) Number. 

<div class="btn-group" role="group">
  <a href="https://shelbycountytn.gov/208/Equal-Opportunity-Compliance-EOC" role="button" class="btn btn-outline-primary">EOC Office Website</a>
  <a href="https://apps.shelbycountytn.gov/EOCPublic/" role="button" class="btn btn-outline-primary">Apply/Renew your EOC license</a>
  <a href="https://apps.shelbycountytn.gov/EOCListings/welcome.xhtml" role="button" class="btn btn-outline-primary">EOC Database</a>
</div>

::: {.callout-tip}
## EOC or LOSB?
You do not need both an EOC and a LOSB number. An LOSB certificate qualifies as an EOC certificate.

LOSB contractors currently receive exclusive first preference to bid on rehab projects within the city of Memphis. Note that this LOSB preference will be going away in the coming months.
:::

### Certificate of Insurance {#COI}

Below are the following policy requirements:

- **Comprehensive General Insurance**: $1,000,000 minimum

- **Worker's Compensation Insurance**: $500,000 minimum

- **Automobile Liability**: $1,000,000 minimum

::: {.callout-warning appearance="simple"}
## Certificate Holder
```
Shelby County Attorney's Office
Contract's Administration
160 N Main Street, Ste. 950
Memphis, TN 38103
```
:::

::: {.callout-warning appearance="simple"}
## Description of Operations
"Shelby County Government, its elected officials, appointees, and employees will be named as additional insured."
:::
